HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is aimed for people who need to downgrade sql databases, using the SQL Management object libary.
The UI is WPF, based on the MVVM design pattern.

Upgrade is easy, the SQL Server attach procedure handles it, but downgrading is much more complicated while preseving the data.

So here it is.
